item.title: Who will Trump pick for Fed chair? Hear from all the candidates in their own words
item.description: President Trump's short list to replace Jerome Powell as Fed chair has turned into a long list of nearly a dozen possible candidates.

item.title: Fed's Goolsbee sees 'note of unease' as central bank looks to next interest rate move
item.description: Goolsbee said a mixed bag of inflation data coupled with uncertainty over tariffs have given him pause about lowering rates.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Intel, Target, UnitedHealth and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Applied Materials, UnitedHealth, Intel and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in extended-hours trading.

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.
